title: Customized Educational Material Search and Utilization Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic information retrieval skills and understanding of fundamental concepts in social sciences
context.additional_context: Cultivating learners' ability to effectively search, evaluate, and reorganize educational materials aligned with their individual research purposes.

learning_goals: Students can efficiently search for reliable social studies materials from academic databases and open educational resources within 3 minutes.
Students can analyze the suitability of retrieved materials based on evaluation criteria (credibility, recency, relevance).
Students can excerpt or reorganize necessary parts for research projects and utilize them as customized educational materials.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
